text.text_translated:
Your manager stops you. She wants to talk about your work on a project. You worry about it all weekend. You think you did something wrong.

On Monday morning, you go into her office. She starts and says you did good work. But you think this is the start of a 'feedback sandwich'.

A feedback sandwich is a special way to talk. First, you say something nice. Then, you say the bad thing. Then, you say something nice again.
